actions.committee: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to improve consumer awareness of motor vehicle safety.
short_title: Consumer Vehicle Safety Awareness Act of 2004

summary.text: Consumer Vehicle Safety Awareness Act of 2004 - Amends the Automobile Information Disclosure Act to require manufacturers to include Government safety rating information on new automobile labels or to note the absence of such a rating. Requires the Secretary of Transportation to prescribe regulations implementing the new labeling requirements.

titles.title: Consumer Vehicle Safety Awareness Act of 2004
A bill to improve consumer awareness of motor vehicle safety.
